topic.title: Zeronet on docker: where is user.json?
topic.body:
So, I'm running zeronnet inside docker container but I would like to change my user masterseed. I "entered" the docker container: 

sudo docker run -i -t nofish/zeronet /bin/bash

While I can find zeronet.py inside /root/ the "/root/data" folder is empty. Normally a users.json file would be in that folder but I can't find it... Anyone has any idea?
